TestCaseMetaData.name: PT
TestCaseMetaData.Description: Mr. Hector Ramos is a 81 year old Hispanic male who is on warfarin therapy. Mr Ramos presents to Good Health Clinic to see Dr. Radon for a routine check up. The doctor orders a Prothrombin Time (PT + INR) test using the clinic's EHR system and instructs Mr Ramos to go to the laboratory's patient service center to have the blood sample collected.
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Minimally populated message. Demonstrate ability to generate a base LOI OML message, populating all the all required data elements for the test case. Minimally populated MSH Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the MSH segment. Minimally populated PID Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the PID segment. Minimally populated ORC Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the ORC segment. Minimally populated OBR Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the OBR segment. Minimally populated DG1 Segment - Demonstrate the capability to support minimally required data elements in the DG1 segment.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: This is the "smoke test" - testing basic functionality and support for all Required elements per the LOI IG to reveal simple failures severe enough to preclude further testing.
